excerpt: The TMCM-1633 is a single axis controller module for brushless DC (BLDC) and PMSM motors. It offers field-oriented control (FOC) with up to 10A RMS phase currents at +48V DC supply. Besides hall sensor and incremental a/b/n encoder interfaces for connection to the motor, digital inputs and outputs can be used. A CAN interface allows communication with a CANopen master.The TMCM-1633 is compatible with Trinamic's baseboard BB-163x.All you need to get started is a power supply and Trinamic's free and easy to use TMCL-IDE. This graphical user interface allows quick setup and supports the use of commands in direct mode, monitors real-time behavior visualized in graphs, and logs and stores data.More about the TMCL-IDESpecial Featuresbreak before makeshort detectionslope controlCurrent Sense
